Root Cause: Web server crash due to resource exhaustion from excessive connections.

Explanation.Log Message: Web server crash detected. Restarting service.

Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Observations: The crash followed a worker process restart due to max connections being exceeded.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Impact: Complete service unavailability requiring a system restart.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Correlations: The crash was a result of the server being overwhelmed by too many connections.

Explanation.Conclusion: The crash was primarily due to the server being unable to handle the high connection load.
